page.title: 02LILLESHALL-POPULATION
page.content: We found the average size{family}is 2 or 3 children; there are almost no families with 5 or more children. The numbers in our{Primary school}for the last 10 years show a rise from 1968 to 1976 and since then a gradual fall until this year when it is levelling off again. This is due to an increase in the number of young children coming into school.{Playgroup}numbers also have increased since May 1983. The number of{pensioners}who collect pensions at Lilleshall Post Office is 90 and some collect from Newport. The reason is probably because there is an old peoples' home in the village. At Lilleshall church in 1985 there have been 17{christenings}so far. The least amount of christenings at the church was in 1981 when there were only 13.
